channel.title: time-lapse on Georgios Karamanis
channel.description: Recent content in time-lapse on Georgios Karamanis

item.title: Windy Uppsala
item.description: First try to do an panning time-lapse video outdoors. A bit shaky because of the strong wind. Music: purple planet

item.title: Sketching
item.description: I've taken up drawing again and been making some time-lapse videos of the sketches. All the sketches are “exercises” from the book “Modern Cartooning” by Chris Hart. Here they are:
